name: Earthy
description: Earthy is an action, shooting, Tower Defense game where You/Earthy have been surrounded and must survive countless waves of The Walking Waste and other enemies from Polludon’s army! In between waves you can build better defenses and choose or upgrade power ups. While surviving, Earthy will help protect special landmarks, and fight off enemies as he awaits help from Earthy's Elite! Earthy can be upgraded in the loadout section of the game, as well as the defenses. If you die, restrategize your moves and survive, survive, Earthy, survive!
